tool_description: This is a api and a backend for your url shortener service. Its a whole backend so you only have to write the front-end!
title: Url shortener backend service

api_list.name: Addaurl
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortener-backend-service.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortener-backend-service.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Redirectingservice
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortener-backend-service.p.rapidapi.com/[code]"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortener-backend-service.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortener-backend-service.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortener-backend-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
